Site Design

I was hired by a starup to come up with a quick redesign of their site. One of the key strengths of the startup are the increases in user engagement. I was asked to begin with the landing page, so that's as far as the site was designed.

Roles

  • Lead Designer

The iteration process was exaustive, but once we came upon the polygon chart, we hit a design we liked.

Ultimately, the company chose not to use the design, but I rather like it. If you wish to use this design, please let me know.
